00017 #include "MisrOrbitPath.h"
00018 #include "MisrCoordQuery.h"
00019 #include "MisrProjParam.h"
00020 #include "MisrError.h"
00021 #include <stdlib.h>
00022 
00023 #define ULI 0           /* Upper left corner index */
00024 #define LRI 1           /* Lower right corner index */
00025 
00038 MTKt_status MtkRegionPathToBlockRange(
00039   MTKt_Region region,   
00040   int path,             
00041   int *start_block,     
00042   int *end_block         )
00043 {
00044   MTKt_status status_code;      /* Return status of this function */
00045   MTKt_status status;           /* Return status */
00046   int b;            /* Block */
00047   int n = 0;            /* Block count */
00048   int sb = 0;           /* Start block */
00049   MTKt_SomRegion rgnsom;    /* Region Som coordinates */
00050   MTKt_SomCoord blksom[2];  /* Block Som coordinate */
00051   MTKt_boolean found = MTK_FALSE; /* Found a corner in the region flag */
00052 
00053   if (start_block == NULL || end_block == NULL)
00054     MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_NULLPTR);
00055 
00056   /* -------------------------------------------------------------------- */
00057   /* Determine SOM coordinates of the corners of the region for this path */
00058   /* -------------------------------------------------------------------- */
00059 
00060   status = MtkLatLonToSomXY(path, region.geo.ctr.lat, region.geo.ctr.lon,
00061                     &rgnsom.ctr.x, &rgnsom.ctr.y);
00062   MTK_ERR_COND_JUMP(status);
00063   rgnsom.path = path;
00064   rgnsom.ulc.x = rgnsom.ctr.x - region.hextent.xlat;
00065   rgnsom.ulc.y = rgnsom.ctr.y - region.hextent.ylon;
00066   rgnsom.lrc.x = rgnsom.ctr.x + region.hextent.xlat;
00067   rgnsom.lrc.y = rgnsom.ctr.y + region.hextent.ylon;
00068 
00069   /* --------------------------------------------------------------- */
00070   /* Loop over each block of the to find a corner inside the region  */
00071   /* --------------------------------------------------------------- */
00072 
00073   for (b = 1; b <= NBLOCK; b++) {
00074 
00075     /* Determine ulc and lrc som coordinates for all this block */
00076     status = MtkBlsToSomXY(path, MAXRESOLUTION, b, 0.0, 0.0,
00077                &blksom[ULI].x, &blksom[ULI].y);
00078     MTK_ERR_COND_JUMP(status);
00079 
00080     status = MtkBlsToSomXY(path, MAXRESOLUTION, b, MAXNLINE-1, MAXNSAMPLE-1,
00081                &blksom[LRI].x, &blksom[LRI].y);
00082     MTK_ERR_COND_JUMP(status);
00083 
00084     /* Checks if ulc of the block is inside the region */
00085     if (blksom[ULI].x >= rgnsom.ulc.x && blksom[ULI].x <= rgnsom.lrc.x &&
00086     blksom[ULI].y >= rgnsom.ulc.y && blksom[ULI].y <= rgnsom.lrc.y)
00087 
00088       found = MTK_TRUE;
00089 
00090     /* Checks if urc of the block is inside the region */
00091     else if (blksom[ULI].x >= rgnsom.ulc.x && blksom[ULI].x <= rgnsom.lrc.x &&
00092          blksom[LRI].y >= rgnsom.ulc.y && blksom[LRI].y <= rgnsom.lrc.y)
00093 
00094       found = MTK_TRUE;
00095 
00096     /* Checks if lrc of the block is inside the region */
00097     else if (blksom[LRI].x >= rgnsom.ulc.x && blksom[LRI].x <= rgnsom.lrc.x &&
00098          blksom[LRI].y >= rgnsom.ulc.y && blksom[LRI].y <= rgnsom.lrc.y)
00099 
00100       found = MTK_TRUE;
00101 
00102     /* Checks if llc of the block is inside the region */
00103     else if (blksom[LRI].x >= rgnsom.ulc.x && blksom[LRI].x <= rgnsom.lrc.x &&
00104          blksom[ULI].y >= rgnsom.ulc.y && blksom[ULI].y <= rgnsom.lrc.y)
00105 
00106       found = MTK_TRUE;
00107 
00108     /* Checks if ulc of the region is inside this block */
00109     else if (rgnsom.ulc.x >= blksom[ULI].x && rgnsom.ulc.x <= blksom[LRI].x &&
00110          rgnsom.ulc.y >= blksom[ULI].y && rgnsom.ulc.y <= blksom[LRI].y)
00111 
00112       found = MTK_TRUE;
00113 
00114     /* Checks if lrc of the region is inside this block */
00115     else if (rgnsom.lrc.x >= blksom[ULI].x && rgnsom.lrc.x <= blksom[LRI].x &&
00116          rgnsom.lrc.y >= blksom[ULI].y && rgnsom.lrc.y <= blksom[LRI].y)
00117 
00118       found = MTK_TRUE;
00119 
00120     /* Checks if block straddles the region horizontally */
00121     if (((blksom[ULI].x >= rgnsom.ulc.x && blksom[ULI].x <= rgnsom.lrc.x) ||
00122      (blksom[LRI].x >= rgnsom.ulc.x && blksom[LRI].x <= rgnsom.lrc.x)) &&
00123     (blksom[ULI].y < rgnsom.ulc.y && blksom[LRI].y > rgnsom.lrc.y))
00124 
00125       found = MTK_TRUE;
00126 
00127     /* Checks if region straddles the block horizontally */
00128     if (((rgnsom.ulc.x >= blksom[ULI].x && rgnsom.ulc.x <= blksom[LRI].x) ||
00129      (rgnsom.lrc.x >= blksom[ULI].x && rgnsom.lrc.x <= blksom[LRI].x)) &&
00130     (rgnsom.ulc.y < blksom[ULI].y && rgnsom.lrc.y > blksom[LRI].y))
00131 
00132       found = MTK_TRUE;
00133 
00134     if (found) {
00135       found = MTK_FALSE;
00136       if (sb == 0) sb = b;
00137       n++;
00138     }
00139   }
00140 
00141   *start_block = sb;
00142   *end_block = sb + n - 1;
00143 
00144   return MTK_SUCCESS;
00145 
00146 ERROR_HANDLE:
00147   return status_code;
00148 }
